name: OSA Workflow Data Sharing
description: Core workflow data sharing and communication tools for OSA personalization strategy agents

tools.name: osa_store_workflow_data
tools.description: Store agent results in shared workflow context for use by subsequent agents

agent_id.description: ID of the agent storing data (content_review, geo_audit, etc.)

agent_results.description: Complete structured results from the agent execution

workflow_id.description: Unique identifier for the workflow execution

tools.name: osa_retrieve_workflow_context
tools.description: Retrieve accumulated workflow context data for current agent execution

workflow_id.description: Unique identifier for the workflow execution

requesting_agent.description: ID of agent requesting context data

include_agents.description: Specific agent IDs to include in context (empty = all previous)

tools.name: osa_send_data_to_osa_webhook
tools.description: Send agent data and results to OSA application via webhook for real-time updates

agent_name.description: Name of the agent sending data (matches OSA endpoint schema)

execution_results.description: Agent execution results and insights (matches OSA endpoint schema)

metadata.description: Agent execution metadata including timestamps, success status, and quality metrics

execution_status.description: Current execution status (in_progress, completed, failed, or partial)

success.description: Whether the agent execution was successful

tools.name: osa_validate_workflow_data
tools.description: Validate workflow data quality and completeness before agent execution

tools.name: osa_compile_final_results
tools.description: Compile all workflow agent results into comprehensive strategy brief for final delivery

compilation_format.description: Output format for compiled results (executive_summary, detailed_brief, or comprehensive)

include_quality_metrics.description: Include data quality and validation metrics

tools.name: osa_track_strategy_progress
tools.description: Monitor strategy implementation progress across phases with milestone tracking and confidence scoring

phase_data.description: Implementation phase progress and completion metrics

tools.name: osa_validate_maturity_level
tools.description: Assess organizational personalization maturity and readiness for advanced strategies

maturity_indicators.description: Technical, content, and organizational maturity metrics

readiness_assessment.description: Assessment of readiness for personalization advancement

tools.name: osa_generate_roadmap_insights
tools.description: Create strategic roadmap with timeline, priorities, and implementation guidance

timeline_data.description: Implementation timeline with phases and dependencies

priority_analysis.description: Priority scoring and rationale for initiatives

tools.name: osa_monitor_workflow_health
tools.description: Monitor real-time workflow execution health with performance metrics and alerts

health_metrics.description: Real-time workflow health indicators and performance data

tools.name: osa_track_agent_performance
tools.description: Track individual OPAL agent performance metrics and optimization opportunities

execution_analytics.description: Agent execution patterns and optimization insights

tools.name: osa_analyze_data_insights
tools.description: Analyze aggregated workflow data to generate strategic insights and recommendations

analytics_scope.description: Scope and parameters for data analysis

insight_categories.description: Categories of insights to generate (content, audience, technical, etc.)

tools.name: osa_calculate_impact_metrics
tools.description: Calculate business impact metrics and performance improvements from personalization strategies

impact_categories.description: Categories of impact to measure (engagement, conversion, performance, etc.)

tools.name: osa_generate_content_insights
tools.description: Generate insights about content performance, gaps, and optimization opportunities across topics

content_analysis.description: Content performance and topic analysis data
